post_message: ONE EGG IS HATCHING! Eaglet Watch 2016 continues as Harriet and her mate M15 wait for their two eaglets to hatch. One egg began to crack yesterday! Fingers crossed we get an eaglet today!   Once an eagle egg begins to crack, it can take 12 to 48 hours for the eaglet to fully hatch.   Live video: Southwest Florida Eagle Cam MORE: @webpagelink
